entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 2:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: NE 38 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
